name: photo-finder
description: Photo Finder application with e2e testing

scripts.setup: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../e2e && npm install && npm run e2e:setup
scripts.e2e:ui: docker-compose up -d db && cd e2e && npm install && npm run e2e:ui
scripts.e2e:setup: cd e2e && npm install && npm run e2e:setup
scripts.dev: npm run db:start && concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "green,cyan" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
